programme.title: El 24
programme.desc: A hitman called Chema and known as El Tumbador, receives the order to kill a man called Manuel who got involved with a Drug Lord mistress.

programme.title: El Bazukazo 2
programme.desc: After being left for dead, Edgar is rescued by a beautiful woman who works in the mafia. When Edgar recovers from his injuries, he joins the new team as an expert in handling weapons is needed.

programme.title: My Stepbrother Is A Vampire
programme.desc: Nancy discovers her new stepbro may be a Vampire.

programme.title: Sanitarium
programme.desc: Dylan goes with Mike to record his last bet, but instead they discover a twisted murderer. Their night becomes a living nightmare.

programme.title: El Comandante Antrax
programme.desc: Commander Anthrax is the armed wing of the Cartel. He is in charge of protecting the place. When a band of kaibiles arrive in the city to try to take over the area, they begin to kill the boss's main associates and force his hand.

programme.title: El Gavilan Justiciero
programme.desc: Two families become intertwined in the bloodiest fight ever seen, where greed and ambition bring suffering to one family and the envy of the other.

programme.title: El Hijo Del Tequilero
programme.desc: Edgardo Mendoza inherits from his deceased father his business of Tequila brewing. When Edgardo unleashes his greed for power and money exploiting his people, a soldier ignites a revolution against him.

programme.title: La Historia De Pedro Y Pablo
programme.desc: When Pedro and Pablo become orphaned, they have to separate so that one of them can study in order to have a better life. Pedro never imagined that in his sacrifice he would also lose the woman of his life.

programme.title: The Yunque Forest: Area 51
programme.desc: During a visit to El Yunque Forest, two cousins are kidnapped and bullied by federal agents after trying to summit the reserve's highest point. Unbeknown to them, there is an "Area 51" facility in there and they just stumbled into it.

programme.title: Stranger
programme.desc: John and Rebecca drive up to a cabin in the woods near Idyllwild for some peace and quiet. A stranger becomes increasingly intrigued by their presence - little do they know, they'll soon be forced into a deadly game he's compelled to play.

programme.title: Plantados
programme.desc: When Ramon discovers that Mauricio, one of the cruelest prison guards he remembers from being incarcerated in Cuba, lives in Florida, he begins to recall various traumatic instances experienced with his torturer. Along with two sons of others ex "plantados", Ramon kidnaps Mauricio and forces him to face the many cruelties he delivered.

programme.title: Perfect Target
programme.desc: A soldier, now a mercenary, has been brought to a foreign country by a former associate to aid in the security of that country's President. But it appears that he's been set up as the man to take the fall for the President's assassination. He escapes and joins the rebels to clear his name, and to expose the true person behind the President's assassination.

programme.title: Los 7 Sellos De La Santa Muerte 2
programme.desc: After dismantling a powerful sect, the mysterious crimes continue and the police are dedicated to investigating who is the new leader of the organization to catch him and put an end to the violence.
